description: This file contains rendering functions for a game scene, specifically designed to render pixel art elements on an HTML5 Canvas. It defines functions to draw the game background, player character, and basic grid overlay, utilizing a simple pixel art palette.

methods.name: renderGameScene
methods.description: Main function to render the game scene onto a canvas, including background and player.

methods.name: drawLevelBackground
methods.description: Draws a grid and background color based on the game state palette.

methods.name: drawPlayer
methods.description: Draws a pixel-art style player character, including body, outline, and face direction indicator.
